main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Mellette, South Dakota in March 1961, involving a large silver-colored object observed by Mrs. Melette and her family.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for several minutes before the object suddenly disappeared., Two jets were dispatched to pursue the flying object., The object was described as large and silver in color., There was considerable uneasiness among the public regarding the sighting., The conclusion of investigations implied that there was a distortion of normal objects by the observers.
witness description: Mrs. Melette and her husband and son
